item.title: Using Kusto functions in Power BI datasource
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to create and use Azure Data Explorer (ADX) Kusto functions as Power BI data sources. Simplify data access and enhance reporting with parameterized functions.
